title: Trying to take credit for that game winning play when you were just mashing buttons

replies.body:
That's me whenever I decide to give {{champion:107}} a shot again, and I end up winning.
_PRESS BUTTONS UNTILL RESOURCEBAR TURNS YELLOW!_
Let's see if that's still the case after his Rework^^
{{champion:121}}: Change is Good
TRIGGERED
only person to survive riots neutering is {{champion:114}}
Really looking forward to him ^^

> Trying to take credit for that game winning play when you were just ~~mashing buttons~~ shopping.

{{champion:240}} I TOLD YA NEVER UNDERESTIMATE THE POWER OF SHROOMS!
{{champion:17}} Scout's\* Code\*
{{champion:240}} YEAH YOU KEEP TELLIN' THAT LIE. WE ALL KNOW WHAT YA MEAN.
{{champion:17}} >:D
Katarina/Sona plays in a nutshell
Hey Ima let you know I have to go through at least 7 keybaords a day
qerwqewerqwer pentakill
W before r and after r every time

Never has worked for my allies, taking the credit for me putting the play together. They are merely tools at my command to use when the time is right! Skarner main and I have found the most useful thing to learn is how ballsy your team is and how willing you are to do something dramatic enough to get them to back you up in a fight. Hardest thing for a tank jg in this meta is alling and expecting a team to back you up but when they dont it is too late.
most tank junglers I get, or just all players in general, never ping before they go In to let us know they are going for it. so half the team is late to the fight....

you shouldnt have to ping you should be sticking to and watching for your tanks engage no matter who you are same with the enemy tank  champions. Champions dont stay out of place for the 3 seconds I takes to recouldnise they close ping them then engage. and tanks arent tanky enough for you to engage 3 seconds after he has been takeing damage from the enemy who collapes on the engageing tank undoubtedly with out any pings and he only has 2 more seconds of living left and about 3 more seconds before any of his cooldowns comes back up
Me every time I {{champion:91}}
Best GIF, upvote.
Always upvote Gargoyles
{{champion:115}}  players can totally relate.
This is pretty much me in ARURF.

this reminds me of when I played Lucian when I had crap Internet.  

We'd go into a team fight, everything would go to hell on my screen, and I'd somehow come out of it with a triple.
yay gargoyles

But don't you have to mash buttons to win? 

Thats you you play the game, right? RIGHT?

I see it now:

Team score: 32/12

>3/9/10 {{champion:17}} (on the winning team)

>"/all gg ez"
